https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vBQfpCYqgEaZlw6F1hZ70k4z4Pe.jpg Appu is a 2002 Indian Kannada romantic action comedy film directed by Puri Jagannadh. It stars debutants Puneeth Rajkumar and Rakshita in lead roles. Appu
